name: Geckle's Ghosts
description:
Made for Pizza Jam in 48 Hours About

Geckle's Ghosts is a dungeon crawling memory game. Fend off oncoming ghosts once when they're visible, then recall how they attacked you when you have to fight their invisible second wave!
